body:
As you noted, the playground is running Go 1.3.2 while the docs are for 1.4.1.

In Go 1.4, `rsa.PrivateKey` had the `Public` method added so that it could satisfy the `crypto.Signer` interface. (See [the release notes](https://golang.org/doc/go1.4#minor_library_changes).) But you can just access `key.PublicKey` directly prior to 1.4 if you need that.
